title: Program for Improving Scientific Literacy Through Online Reading Strategy Training

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific terminology and concepts, possession of foundational reading skills
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment, case-centered education for practical application, and emphasis on peer collaborative learning.

learning_goals: Learners can apply strategic reading skills to analyze scientific texts and extract key information.
Learners enhance their critical reading abilities and understand the logical structure of scientific documents by utilizing metacognitive strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
